DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if Zemplar, a vitamin D medication, safely and effectively decreases parathyroid hormone in children ages 2-20 with End Stage Renal Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Effectiveness of Zemplar Injection in Decreasing iPTH Levels in Pediatric ESRD Subjects on Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Subjects ages 220 with ESRD on hemodialysis with Secondary hyperparathyroidism
